statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT employee_id, punctuality_score FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE attendance_status='Present'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE punctuality_score > 8.0
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_details->'fingers' AS fingers_count FROM hand_geometry_data
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY punctuality_score DESC
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_details FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE punctuality_score > 0.8 ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, attendance_status, punctuality_score FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE punctuality_score BETWEEN 0.7 AND 0.9 ORDER BY attendance_status ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, punctuality_score FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE punctuality_score < 0.5;
SELECT employee_id, hand_geometry_details, attendance_status FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE attendance_status LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT employee_id, attendance_date FROM employees ORDER BY attendance_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, punctuality_score FROM employees WHERE punctuality_score > 80
SELECT AVG(hours_worked) AS average_hours_worked FROM attendance_reports
SELECT * FROM attendance_reports WHERE report_date = '2023-09-15'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE punctuality_score > 80 ORDER BY punctuality_score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT employee_id, attendance_date, punctuality_score FROM employees JOIN attendance_reports ON employees.employee_id = attendance_reports.employee_id WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY attendance_date ASC, punctuality_score DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM employees LEFT JOIN attendance_reports ON employees.employee_id = attendance_reports.employee_id GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_reports > 5 ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(punctuality_score) AS max_punctuality_score FROM employees GROUP BY employee_id HAVING MAX(punctuality_score) > 90 ORDER BY max_punctuality_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(hours_worked) AS avg_hours_worked, MIN(punctuality_score) AS min_punctuality_score FROM attendance_reports JOIN employees ON employees.employee_id = attendance_reports.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT report_date, punctuality_score FROM attendance_report WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employee WHERE department = 'HR' AND position = 'Assistant';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE department != 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data JOIN employee ON hand_geometry_data.employee_id = employee.employee_id;
SELECT AVG(punctuality_score) AS average_punctuality FROM attendance_report GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM attendance_report GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_details;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employee_details ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendance_records WHERE date = '2022-01-10' AND check_out_time > '18:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, punctuality_score FROM employee_details INNER JOIN punctuality_reports ON employee_details.employee_id = punctuality_reports.employee_id WHERE punctuality_score < 80;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_data ORDER BY hand_length DESC, finger_length ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE position='Manager';
SELECT MAX(punctuality_score) AS highest_punctuality_score FROM punctuality_reports;
SELECT e.employee_name, a.date, a.check_in_time, a.check_out_time FROM employee_details e JOIN attendance_records a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT AVG(hand_length) AS average_hand_length, AVG(finger_length) AS average_finger_length FROM hand_geometry_data;
SELECT * FROM employee LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee WHERE hire_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employee ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM department WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM punctuality_report WHERE punctuality_score > 90;
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, department_name FROM employee INNER JOIN department ON employee.employee_id = department.manager_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM attendance GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(punctuality_score) AS average_score FROM punctuality_report GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY average_score DESC;
